title: Scrambled Eggs with Ziba's Classic Potato Chips
instructions: Step 1. Heat the oil in a pan over high heat and drop the eggs.
Step 2. Reduce temperature over medium heat and lid.
Step 3. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Step 4. Kitchen until you have the term of the desired yolk and remove from the pan.
Step 5. Place on a plate and serve with the Zibas above.
